org.jetel.metadata

Class XsdMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.metadata.MXAbstract
      • org.jetel.metadata.XsdMetadata

  • public class XsdMetadata
extends MXAbstract
    Class implementing export of data record metadata to XSD.
    Since:
    12/14/06

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
        Converts clover metadata read from XML file to XSD written to file. XML file can be metadata file or graph file. If XML file is graph, then you define metadata_id. usage: XsdMetadata [--metadata_id id] [infile] [outfile]
        Parameters:
        argv - {input_file, output_file}. "-" for std input/output
